dt: {bc}lying, growing, worn, performed, or operating below the surface of the water
{bc}being below the waterline of a ship
{bc}having, relating to, or being a mortgage loan for which more is owed than the property securing the loan is worth
{bc}having, relating to, or being a stock option for which the price of the option is higher than the current market value of the stock
